body.p: The uses an internal shopping cart where customers can add products from various retailers to a single cart. The customer checks out though the site's order placement process. The Order Placement Engine (OPE) will place the order on the retailer e-commerce shopping site(s), on behalf of the customer. The customer will never see the retailer site(s).

section.title: Using Retailer Shopping Site
section.p: The OPE is a java program that crawls the retailer site simulating a card member adding products to the cart and checking out. The system uses a controller for each retailer integration and is highly customizable. The controller uses HTTP GET and POST requests along with JavaScript to place orders.

section.title: Using Web Service or API
section.p: The OPE can integrate with a web service or API to place orders. This is the preferred method of integration. The integration process takes place during partner onboarding.
